正電気: (せいでんき) - positive electric charge; positive (static) charge; (sometimes called "positive electricity")
正露丸: (せいろがん) - seirogan; beechwood extract popular as a herbal treatment for diarrhoea (diarrhea), etc.
正面: (しょうめん) - front; frontage; facade; main
正面切って: (しょうめんきって) - openly; squarely; directly; to a person's face
正面攻撃: (しょうめんこうげき) - frontal attack
正面玄関: (しょうめんげんかん) - front entrance; front door
正面衝突: (しょうめんしょうとつ) - head-on collision
正音: (せいおん) - correct Chinese (on) pronunciation of a character
此: (し) - This , this (indicando um item próximo ao falante, a ação do falante ou o tópico atual)
此から先: (これからさき) - from now on; in the future; hereafter; ahead of us; down the road
此の: (この) - this (something or someone close to the speaker (including the speaker), or ideas expressed by the speaker)
此の上: (このうえ) - furthermore; besides; moreover; in addition; further; above or beyond this
此の上とも: (このうえとも) - from now on; in the future; further
此の上無い: (このうえない) - the most; the best; peerless; the greatest; first-rate
此の世: (このよ) - this world; the present life (in contrast to the land of the dead)
此の中: (このうち) - meanwhile; the other day; recently
此の位: (このぐらい) - this much; this amount
此の先: (このさき) - beyond this point; from now on; after this
此の内: (このうち) - meanwhile; the other day; recently
此の前: (このまえ) - some time ago/recently/lately; last (Sunday, etc.)/previous
此の度: (このたび) - this occasion; at this time; now
此の後: (このあと) - after this; henceforth; henceforward; from now on
此の手: (このて) - this way (of doing); this sort (of thing)
此の方: (このほう) - this one; this way; this method
此の期: (このご) - now (with the nuance of 'the last moment'); this late in the game
此の期に及んで: (このごにおよんで) - at the last moment; this late in the game
此の様: (このよう) - like this; this sort; this way
此の様に: (このように) - in this manner; in this way; like this
此の程: (このほど) - now/at this time; the other day/recently/lately
此の節: (このせつ) - these days; now; recently
此の親にしてこの子あり: (このおやにしてこのこあり) - (proverb) the apple doesn't fall far from the tree; like father, like son
此の親にして此の子あり: (このおやにしてこのこあり) - (proverb) the apple doesn't fall far from the tree; like father, like son
此の親にして此の子有り: (このおやにしてこのこあり) - (proverb) the apple doesn't fall far from the tree; like father, like son
此の辺: (このへん) - this area; around here
此の辺り: (このあたり) - this area; around here
此の間: (このかん) - the other day/lately/recently/during this period; (このかん only) meanwhile/in the meantime
此の際: (このさい) - on this occasion; now
此の頃: (このころ) - in those days; at the time; then
此の頃様: (このごろよう) - modern; latest; up-to-date
此れ: (これ) - this (indicating an item near the speaker, the action of the speaker, or the current topic); this person (usu. indicating someone in one's in-group); now; here; I (me); certainly
此れこそ: (これこそ) - (emphatic form of これ)  this
此れっぽち: (これっぽち) - only this much; only this little
此れっぽっち: (これっぽっち) - this little; this few; in the slightest
此れっ切り: (これっきり) - last time (as of now)/never again; only this
此れっ許り: (これっぱかり) - this little; this few; in the slightest
此れと言って: (これといって) - not worth mentioning (with neg. verb); nothing special
此れは: (これは) - as for this; hey there (expression of surprise when one encounters something unexpected)/see here/I say
此れまでで: (これまでで) - (usu. used in superlative clauses together with 一番, 最も, 最悪, etc.)  to date; as of now
此れを以て: (これをもって) - with this I (formal); by this I (formal)
此れ丈: (これだけ) - so many (few); so much (little)
此れ位: (これぐらい) - this much; this amount
此れ切り: (これぎり) - last time (as of now)/never again; only this
此れ幸い: (これさいわい) - taking advantage of (a convenient situation)
此れ式: (これしき) - trifle; insignificant thing; (only) this much
此れ彼: (これかれ) - this and that; this person and that person/anybody
此れ此れ: (これこれ) - this and that; such and such
此れ程: (これほど) - so; so much; this much
此れ見よがし: (これみよがし) - for show; ostentatious; flaunting; showing off
此れ許り: (こればかり) - only this much; only this
此れ迄で: (これまでで) - (usu. used in superlative clauses together with 一番, 最も, 最悪, etc.)  to date; as of now
此処: (ここ) - here (place physically close to the speaker, place pointed by the speaker while explaining)/this place; these last (followed by a duration noun and a past sentence: time period before the present time of the speaker); these next ... (followed by a duration noun and a non past sentence: time period after the present time of the speaker)/the next ...
此処いら: (ここいら) - around here; in this vicinity; this area
此処が思案のし所: (ここがしあんのしどころ) - This is the point we need to think about
此処ぞ: (ここぞ) - (often used as ここぞというとき or ここぞとばかり) at the critical moment; when it counts
此処で会ったが百年目: (ここであったがひゃくねんめ) - at last your time has come; I have found you at last
此処で逢ったが百年目: (ここであったがひゃくねんめ) - at last your time has come; I have found you at last
此処に於て: (ここにおいて) - now/at this time; as such/for this reason/hence
此処の所: (ここのところ) - of late; lately
此処ん所: (ここんとこ) - recently; lately; these days
此処一番: (ここいちばん) - the crucial moment; the moment of truth; do-or-die situation; crucial juncture; crucial stage
此処彼処: (ここかしこ) - here and there; around and about
此奴: (こやつ) - this fellow; this guy; this person
此奴ら: (こいつら) - these guys; these fellows
此度: (こたび) - this occasion; at this time; now
此彼: (これかれ) - this and that; this person and that person/anybody
此所: (ここ) - here (place physically close to the speaker, place pointed by the speaker while explaining)/this place; these last (followed by a duration noun and a past sentence: time period before the present time of the speaker); these next ... (followed by a duration noun and a non past sentence: time period after the present time of the speaker)/the next ...
此方: (こんた) - (こなた only)   this way/here; (こなた only) the person in question/he/she/him/her; (こなた only) since (a time in the past)/prior to (a time in the future); (こなた only) me; you
此方の話: (こちらのはなし) - matter being discussed (e.g. in a private conversation); our side of the story (in contrast to another's version)
